com.paydiant.android.core.domain.transactionflow

Class TransactionFlowRuleSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paydiant.android.core.domain.transactionflow.TransactionFlowRuleSpecification

  • public class TransactionFlowRuleSpecification
extends Object
    Provides the details of the transaction flow rules.
    Since:
    3.8.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.
